title: Does ELO hell exist or not?
body:
Okay, I've seen a lot of different things on this, and for myself, I've decided I'm just bad.. Or at least, not good enough to carry myself out of bronze yet. So what does everyone else think, does it exist? Also, what should I be focusing my practice on to help me leave bronze? So far I'm working on;

more map awareness
never assume your enemy is stupid
farm more cs
learn to stutter step better
learn to position better
practice stances and trading.

Any input is ofcourse appreciated, please no toxicity. Thanks in advance guys.

replies.body:
Don't listen to these morons every high elo player will tell you the same thing. There is no "Elo Hell", "It's just made up by players who are looking to put the blame on others but themselves"  Yes to an extent this is true..  However to an extent elo hell does exist...

I have been in bronze for 2 years now. i have come a long way and last season i was in bronze 1 pulled myself all the way from bronze 5 through the whole season.. Did my placements this season and what you know? bronze 5? from bronze 1.. I lost 4 won 6, which i didn't think was bad at all.

I thought no worries i will pull myself up easy. Oh but was i wrong... this oce server is so rotten and toxic with afkers and trolls you could never hope in hell to solo carry, and sure its not just in bronze.. BUT there is a bronze mentality. "IM IN BRONZE I DON'T CARE" "YOU'RE IN BRONZE I DON'T CARE" "WHAT'S THE POINT" In fact it gets so bad to where you do well every game you do your part and then some, and others will be selfish and see that you are doing well and feed on purpose and go out of their way to rob you of a win.

BUT there is light at the end of the tunnel my friend to really get out of this hell hole they call bronze to silver (Which apparently isn't much different) all you really need to do is legit start acting like your team are a bunch of idiots who can't think or do anything for themselves. play roles and champs with high mobility, you need to help help help help, its all good and well if you are butt rapping your lane but it wont mean anything later on when you have all the kills and your team has nothing, as soon as you die it's GG. So what you need to do is gank and try spread the kills around the team get the "idiots" ahead as much as possible. and once you can do that which in time you will. you will see that you will fly up the ladder.

> this oce server is so rotten and toxic with afkers and trolls **you could never hope in hell to solo carry**

Didn't you *just* claim to have done so?

> last season i was in bronze 1 pulled myself all the way from bronze 5 through the whole season

If you read it clearly, i state the whole season. I then stated i thought no worries it would be easy i will do it in a matter of days to weeks.
So again read it.

I am sorry it's not clear enough for you? would you like me to edit it? or are you done being a smart arse?

So in other words, it was still done.

Also if you agree boosting exists (which it does) then you agree that Elo Hell CAN'T exist.

What does exist is a lesser ability to climb as you reach what is close to your skill level, it's harder to climb from say Silver 2 to Silver 1 as a Gold 5 worthy player then a Gold 1 worthy player (because your a decent way better as the gold 1)

The closer you are to your real rating, the more you stagnate.

Okay so I don't understand your logic if boosting is real which it is as you said, how does that mean Elo hell does not exist? They have nothing to do with each other? If your far better than the div you are in for example and when it comes to team fights and your team is completely helpless not to mention they have feed the whole team. If your team are unskilled no matter how much you help you will lose team fights over and over there is only so much you can carry.  

And yes I agree the close you get to your skill level cap the more stagnent your climbing gets as well with how well you do and k/d

Fact is boosters can win a majority of their game, and they get the same feeders.

Meaning elo hell simply doesn't exist, cause their is very few games that are actually unwinnable.
Plat and diamond skill cap sure gold 50/50 but besides that not really lol, i can see where you are coming from but.

I'm asking for some clarity in regards to two seemingly contradictory statements. You first claim to have climbed from bronze 5 to bronze 1 but then claim climbing is impossible. Do you not mean what you have written? Are one of your statements inaccurate?

I nevee claimed to have solo carried myself it can be done with luck of having decent teams and that's why I stated "whole season" I can see where you are coming from though and I am sorry for the confusion and wrong use of wording :)

then why is it high elo players can win basically every game regardless what team mates they have in low elo on smurfs? 

Mechanics, Champ pool, Build order vs matchup instead of using the same build over and over, Warding, anticipating ganks, Roaming, When to push and when to freeze, Objective control, Decision making, Team fight positioning. These are some things that is the difference from a good player and a bad. Ive seen players who win lane and have good mechanics in low elo, but they do the dumbest %%%% or never roam or ward and thats the difference from say plat and bronze.. the little things.

You are talkng about a plat player here. We aren't able to climb due to our teams and therefore in doing so we can't face higher  elo players and progress our skills further it's Just like lifting weights or doing anything really to get better you need more weights more a higher difficulty and we can't have that due to not being able to climb because of what I have just said over And over do you understand me or get what I mean?

from my experience the only real elo hell is duoing with someone much lower than you and ruining your MMR making your gains terrible and losses huge. Other than that, there isnt a elo hell. Its just bad players that cant carry, and for all the players in low elo that say "i win lane every time and go 10000-0" well you obviously still have no idea how to win a game because getting all the kills means nothing.

Sadly, I've been that dumb before, was gold 3 duoed with my B5 irl friend. And holy %%%% did my MMR get butt%%%%ed. (It really sensors swearing), anyway on another note. Elo hell doesn't exist, its a made up thing to excuse people from making big mistakes.

I do believe in elo hell but I think of it differently. I never blame my teammates with this belief.
Elo hell is a rank at which you are better than the majority of players in the league. But not to the point where you can definitively carry games.
I mean, you might get a positive score and high cs every time. But you don't do well enough to carry a team that went even or got a little bit behind.

Have a nice day!

There is one fact in regards to ELO hell, it does not exist. It is a fictional creation of the community to explain why they are incapable of climbing without putting blame on themselves. They simply claim they are in ELO hell and all blame goes to their team mates instead of the faults with their own gameplay and skill.

last season i was in silver this season i have been placed in b1 and for me there is no "elo hell" but there is so much toxicity in bronze and silver. So if you are not winning your lane than people on your team start to think they are better than you and they just flame you the whole game. This why people troll and give up on games. Personally i dont care what other people say about me i just ignore them and try to focus on what i can do to help my team to win the game.
I don't know what that has to do with my post. I'd agree with those statements though, people can be pretty abusive when you're having an off game.

I like how people complain about this %%%% when...
If you deserve to be higher and you don't get angry and troll, you are that one player in the game assured not to be bad, right?
So statistically, your team will have a higher chance of winning and you should win a majority of games because both teams have the same chance to get trolls, AFKs and terrible players.

Well, the ELO Bible talks about an ELO Hell.

To an extent I believe there is an ELO Hell. It sure is more frustrating to play in the lower ELOs with the higher volume of trolls. So its easier to go on tilt and its easier to give up. However, the idea that its an impossible-to-climb-from ELO is just dumb.
I have found the climb out of bronze 5 to be harder than my climb out of s5.
If it is an established fact that high skill players can boost you,  it is equally true that low skill players can hold you back.

Climbed from b5 out to gold last season, and did the b5 to b2 yesterday. last season i spent a month playing all night blaming teams and playing normal champ, before i got the mindset that they're all %%%% and started playing kata heimer every game. honestly, if you get a decent duo (high bronze/low silver will do), it's extremely easy to both win your lanes and snowball the game from there. My friend and I are 12/2 in the last 2 days, the people here are so tilty/just plain bad that getting out is easy as penta.

Elo hell doesn't exist to a point, what does make bronze difficult is when smurfs hide in bronze and just straight up out play and BM every single player they come across, usually they play in pairs.


its mostly gold players who do it. they cant go any further on the ladder or they are tilting hard and need a few punching bags.. 

what's interesting is this very behaviour actually promotes elo boosting, which in turn moves those bronze players to high silver/gold, which in turn means those boosted players destroy their games.

solo Q is not without a sense of irony

for getting out of bronze, the best tip ever possible: die less.

it doesnt matter if you go 0-1 or 10-1. thats still 1 death you may have been able to prevent. once that number goes up, thats more mistakes that need to be fixed.
if you can get 5 games in a row with less than 2 deaths. aim for less than 1 death in 5 games, or 10 games of less than 2 deaths. keep working on that and eventually....you will win more games than you lose and instantly move out of bronze.
